item.description:
Green Juices & Smoothies for Vibrant Health

Adding green foods to your juice or smoothies makes them nutrient-dense and mineral-rich, infusing them with lifeforce energy, crucial enzymes and raw foods. By bringing greens back into our foods, we can greatly improve our own health. And green juices and smoothies are one of the best ways to achieve this goal.

Alchmey makes wonderful green juices and uses a variety of greens added to smoothies. While enjoying our drink selections, we'll discuss the benefits of green foods. You will receive a handout with incredible recipes for awesome green juices and smoothies. There is no charge for this event except the cost of your green drink.

Getting greens into the body is very important for vibrant health. In just one glass of green juice or smoothie, you can get more than half the amount of recommended daily fruits and vegetables.
item.why: it's good for you and it's green!
item.name: Green Juices & Smoothies for Vibrant Health
